room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Puzzah downtown is hands down the most fun escape room company in Colorado. Tick Tock is fun and semi challenging...we got out with approx 3 min toSpare with just two people

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: So much fun!!!!!! Had a blast, and our 5 month old slept through half then got to tag along for the second half! Thanks puzzah! Please build one in Boise

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Challenging and fun puzzle rooms! We have done 2 so far and enjoyed them both.

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: Super fun and mind boggling in the best way possible. Will definitely come back and tell all my friends about it.

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: This was my first ever doing something like this and it was awesome! The staff was great too!!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: We surprised my sister with the Tick-Tock room for her birthday as part of our girls day and it was a total success! We LOVED it! I want to do another!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: We wanted something different to do on a night out and this was a great option. Lots of laughter as we set off the alarm 28 times! We want to come back and try and cut that in half!!!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tock" by Puzzah! in Denver
review: I took a group of twelve to Puzzah! for a team-building event, and it was a 100% success. Everyone enjoyed the challenge and we all learned a lot about puzzles, problem-solving and working together. AND, it was just a lot of fun. This place is great for corporate team-building, but it would also be great for date night, Friday night out with friends, etc. We will be back, for sure.
